text: قَالَ مُوسَىٰٓ أَتَقُولُونَ لِلۡحَقِّ لَمَّا جَآءَكُمۡۖ أَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَا وَلَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلسَّـٰحِرُونَ

translation.en: Moses said, "Do you say [thus] about the truth when it has come to you? Is this magic? But magicians will not succeed
translation.id: Musa berkata, "Pantaskah kamu mengatakan terhadap kebenaran ketika ia datang kepadamu, 'sihirkah ini?' Padahal para penyihir itu tidaklah mendapat kemenangan
